snippet: Ai Weiwei said Friday that he had filed a lawsuit with two courts against the Beijing tax authorities for violating his rights in bringing a tax case against him.
abstract: Ai Weiwei, China’s most famous rebel artist, files lawsuit against Beijing tax authorities for violating his rights in bringing a tax case against him; tax officials claim Ai’s company Beijing Fake Cultural Development Ltd owes $2.4 million in back taxes and penalties.
lead_paragraph: Ai Weiwei said Friday that he had filed a lawsuit with two courts against the Beijing tax authorities for violating his rights in bringing a tax case against him.

headline.seo: China: Artist Ai Weiwei Fights Back
